translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

Since the cattle have not yet been delivered to Major Faria by Your Excellency Rafael Teixeira Marins, my previous orders regarding the delivery of the same to said Major Faria are rendered null and void.

Secretary of State of the Treasury Affairs in Piratini, January 28, 1839.

(a) Domingos José de Almeida

Most Illustrious Colonel João Antônio da Silveira, Commander of the Right Division.
